item.title: How to Not Get Lost in Trade Space
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
What we are capable of usually gets discovered in some stressful or emergency situations. However, here at our branding agency, we help our clients avoid such situations and solve…

The post How to Not Get Lost in Trade Space first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
What we are capable of usually gets discovered in some stressful or emergency situations. However, here at our branding agency, we help our clients avoid such situations and solve all the issues in time with minimum effort and maximum effect. Our creative designers, developers, and managers work to improve your business and provide excellent marketing service!

item.title: New York Creativity Awards Gala 2018
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
NEW YORK timelapse from dimid on Vimeo. Exciting news for all our readers, subscribers, and clients – the agency was nominated for multiple awards at the latest New York…

The post New York Creativity Awards Gala 2018 first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
NEW YORK timelapse from dimid on Vimeo.

Exciting news for all our readers, subscribers, and clients – the agency was nominated for multiple awards at the latest New York Gala Ad Event, where young and successful teams compete with catchy ads, branding achievements, and digital design development. It happened so fast, and we are proud of what we have accomplished, as well as excited to support other groups.

item.title: The Win-Win Strategy for Your Brand
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Marketers collect as much data as possible and analyze it with the best and the worst prospective for your business. They look in the future and see the achievable…

The post The Win-Win Strategy for Your Brand first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
Marketers collect as much data as possible and analyze it with the best and the worst prospective for your business. They look in the future and see the achievable goals to find the best tools to make it all happen. If you wish to learn more about achieving the goals, get a free consultation from our team leader and see for yourself how to manage your company easily!

item.title: Expectations and Reality of Your First Meeting
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Meeting a new client is basically the same responsibility as meeting a new marketing/design agent. We all get worried and excited and want to share the ideas, however, sometimes…

The post Expectations and Reality of Your First Meeting first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
Meeting a new client is basically the same responsibility as meeting a new marketing/design agent. We all get worried and excited and want to share the ideas, however, sometimes the reality is different from what we want it to be. There are many factors that change your positive attitude to a bit depressed one. But here, at our studio, we let you be as much excited and crazy as much as you wish. We’re right there with ya!

item.title: What Your Marketers Do Not Tell You
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
The subject of marketing is to first and foremost create a customer – this was what Peter Drucker once said. And in some way, it is an absolute truth.…

The post What Your Marketers Do Not Tell You first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
The subject of marketing is to first and foremost create a customer – this was what Peter Drucker once said. And in some way, it is an absolute truth. We help you start something great and powerful, but we can’t predict how long it’ll last, because market and customers change daily if not hourly. At our agency, we do not keep secrets from you as our client.

item.title: Being the Creative Project Manager
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Due to the high competition among agencies being a leader is an extremely hard work. It involves being a project manager plus personnel manager. Unfortunately, these are two inseparable…

The post Being the Creative Project Manager first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
Due to the high competition among agencies being a leader is an extremely hard work. It involves being a project manager plus personnel manager. Unfortunately, these are two inseparable parts of the job. But there are also many positive aspects of this job! You get to develop multiple skills that can serve you only good.
